level.heading: Prudent administration.
level.text: A trustee shall administer the trust as a prudent person would, by considering the purposes, terms, distributional requirements, and other circumstances of the trust. In satisfying this standard, the trustee shall exercise reasonable care, skill, and caution.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 804 of the Uniform Trust Code.
